title: QueryCBRN4
description: This message queries the last CBRN4 message with ATP-45 payload or the message with specified report id.

MessageID.comment: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message

CBRN4ReportID.comment: The report reference is an identifier associated with the CBRN Detection. 0=Last report

StationNumber.comment: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations
